item.title: Create a Bootable USB ESXi Installer
item.description: To install ESXi onto a bare metal server without a CD/DVD drive or a KVM console, the simplest way is to create a bootable USB drive with the ESXi installer. To do this, we will use a tool called Rufus. Download the latest portable release of Rufus Download the ESXi ISO image (.iso file type) ESXi 6.7 ESXi 6.5 Connect the USB device to your Computer Open Rufus Select the USB device Select the ESXi installer ISO Ensure 'MBR partition' & 'BIOS or EUFI' are selected Select Start Select Yes to replace menu.
